LanguageData.FungusEating_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.FungusEating_Despised.description: That dark-grown fungus food is just disgusting.
LanguageData.FungusEating_Preferred.label: preferred
LanguageData.FungusEating_Preferred.description: Fungus is the right crop to eat. Crops of the light are poisoned by the air and sun.
